headline: Is Amgen’s Recent Rally Justified After Strong Clinical Trial Results?
summary: Curious if Amgen is worth your investment dollars right now? Let’s take a clear-eyed look at where the stock stands and whether the value justifies the price. Amgen's stock has been on a strong upward path lately, gaining 2.3% in the past week and 18.3% over the last month. This has fueled conversations about its ongoing growth story. Recent headlines highlight Amgen's progress in the biotech space, including promising results from clinical trials and new drug approvals that have piqued...
